lyrics:
[Intro]
Aw yeah that's right
All you single people out there
This is for you
Yeah

[Verse 1]
I'm not waitin' around for a man to save me
Cause I'm happy where I am
Don't depend on a guy to validate me (no, no)
I don't need to be anyone's baby
Is that so hard to understand?
No I don't need another half to make me whole

[Pre-Chorus]
Make your move if you want
Doesn't mean I will or won't
I'm free to make my mind up
You either got it or you don't

[Chorus]
This is my current single status
My declaration of independence
There's no way I'm trading places
Right now my star's in the ascendant
I'm single (right now)
That's how I wanna be
I'm single (right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)

[Post-Chorus]
Yeah, uh huh, that's right

[Verse 2]
Don't need to be on somebody's arm to look good
I like who I am
I'm not saying I don't wanna fall in love, cause I would
I'm not gonna get hooked up just cause you say I should
Can't romance on demand
I'm gonna wait, so I'm sorry if you misunderstood

Ooohh yeah

[Chorus]
This is my current single status
My declaration of independence
There's no way I'm trading places
Right now a star's in the ascendant
I'm single (right now)
That's how I wanna be
I'm single (right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)
I'm single (right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)
I'm single, oh oh ooh

[Bridge]
Everything in it's right time
Everything in it's right place
I know I'll settle down one day (one day)
But 'til then I like it this way...
I'm single and I'm liking it this way
I'm single and I'm solo, and I'm happy
Oh, I like it this way, eh
Make your move if you want doesn't mean I will or won't
I'm free to make my mind up you either got it or you don't (Until then I'm single)

[Chorus]
This is my current single status
My declaration of independence (single)
There's no way I'm trading places (ooh)
Right now a star's in the ascendant (ooh)
This is my current single status
My declaration of independence (single)
There's no way I'm trading places (ooh)
Right now a star's in the ascendant (ooh)
I'm single (Right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)
I'm single (Right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)
I'm single (Right now)
That's how I wanna be (right now)
I'm single
Woooah
That's how I wanna be

[Outro]
Ooh ooh ooh ooh oooh oooh
Ooh ooh ooh ooh oooh oooh
Ooh ooh ooh ooh oooh oooh
Ooh ooh ooh ooh oooh oooh
